title: Embroidery, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: embroidered in satin and knot stitch
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Design of figures and flowers, embroidered in polychrome silks in satin and knot stitch, all spaces solidly filled in with couched gold wound on thread

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery, 18th–19th century.
18th–19th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: embroidered in satin and knot stitch. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-93.
